page.title: 07A day in Ben's life.Lydden.
page.content: On Sunday morning I got up at half past nine.I dressed and then had breakfast. My mum washed up and I dried the dishes.I watched my dad as he started to mix some concrete.He is using it to build our house.After that my mum tarted to get the dinner ready. 1 played with my Lego and began to make a machine gun.This took quite some time and then my mum said that it was dinner time.My nan came to visit us and she stayed for dinner as well.We had roast beef and Yorkshire pudding with cabbage and carrots. After dinner I went outside and played on the swing for a while.I decided to have a barbecue.I started cooking beans,sausages and potatoes on a fire in my back garden.It smelt good and tasted really delicious!I watched some television and then at nine thirty I went to bed.
